derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'handle roughly or rudely'): frequentative of dialect touse 'handle roughly', of Germanic origin and related to German zausen. Compare with tussle

sentences.en: His hair was tousled and he looked as if he’d just woken up.
